name: Insulator
description:
Insulator is a fast paced game where you have to spawn rubber band balls to push wild electricity back into its circuit. The Electricity and your rubber balls are completely out of control. Made for GMTK 2020 Game Jam as a solo project!

The game is also designed to be played completely on its own and run "forever" :D

Music From: A Drop A Day

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCcK9Pfwv71TtGiXsROTsfug
